text:
K-Pop super group BTS is finally launching their own beauty line. By
												

	Isis Briones K-Pop super group BTS is finally going where few K-Pop groups have gone before (though they definitely should’ve): a beauty line. BTS Reveal ‘Serendipity’ Comeback Trailer for ‘Love Yourself: Her’ Album Members Suga and J-Hope already live streamed their entire beauty routine, so this was bound to happen sooner or later. Digital Music News reports the Korean group partnered with K-beauty line VT Cosmetics to launch their very own makeup and collection of skincare products. Though exact details of what fans can fully expect has yet to be revealed, Refinery 29 confirms BTS’ first drop will include the boys’ exclusive sunscreen. The lotion will feature seven sunscreen cushion compacts, in honor of each singer from the band. Summer may be over, but we guarantee these compacts will still sell out, so keep your eyes open for what’s to come. Other products are also rumored to come out this fall and we can hardly wait to see what creative items they come up with. title: BTS K-Beauty Line is Coming Soon: Details| Billboard – Billboard
